note_models.name: Basic

fields: Do you know where this Anki deck originated?

This deck is part of an open collaborative effort started by YYC Net Lab. This deck is provided free of charge and without warranty. For updates please see the link below. If you notice any errors or would like to add some cards please reach out to YYC Net Lab through Github.

To stop seeing this card click on 'More' in the bottom right and select 'Suspend Card'.
https://github.com/yycnetlab/ankidecks
If CEF is missing the information necessary in the adjacency table to perform a MAC rewrite, what adjacency type will be formed?
Glean
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/docs/ip/express-forwarding-cef/13706-20.html#express
Why would CEF create a glean adjacency?
It is missing the information necessary in the adjacency table to perform a MAC rewrite.
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/docs/ip/express-forwarding-cef/13706-20.html#express
What command would you use to configure a Cisco Catalyst 3750 to support IPv6?
Switch(config)#sdm prefer dual-ipv4-and-ipv6 default
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/switches/lan/catalyst3750x_3560x/software/release/12-2_55_se/configuration/guide/3750xscg/swsdm.html#24325
What does the command "sdm prefer dual-ipv4-and-ipv6 default" accomplish on a Cisco Catalyst 3750v2 switch?
It allows the switch to support IPv4 and IPv6 by changing the Software Database Manager (SDM) profile.
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/switches/lan/catalyst3750x_3560x/software/release/12-2_55_se/configuration/guide/3750xscg/swsdm.html#24325
What is the  action taken by a switch when a frame is received destined to a MAC that it does not have a record for in its MAC address table?
Floods the frame out all ports (unknown unicast flooding)
CCNP / CCIE Enterprise Core (350-401) ENCOR Official Cert Guide, Chapter 1 Packet Forwarding, Page 6
Why might a switch perform unknown unicast flooding?
The switch received a frame destined to a MAC address that it has no record of in its MAC address table / CAM table.
CCNP / CCIE Enterprise Core (350-401) ENCOR Official Cert Guide, Chapter 1 Packet Forwarding, Page 6
What VLANs are part of the normal VLAN range that can be added, modified, or deleted by a network administrator?
CCNP / CCIE Enterprise Core (350-401) ENCOR Official Cert Guide, Chapter 1 Packet Forwarding, Page 7
What is the range of VLANs 2-1001 considered?
The normal VLAN range (that is modifiable, deletable, and/or addable)
CCNP / CCIE Enterprise Core (350-401) ENCOR Official Cert Guide, Chapter 1 Packet Forwarding, Page 7
Which notable table is used to build the contents of the CEF adjacency table?
ARP table
CCNP / CCIE Enterprise Core (350-401) ENCOR Official Cert Guide, Chapter 1 Packet Forwarding, Page 28
What CEF table is the ARP table used to build?
Adjacency table
CCNP / CCIE Enterprise Core (350-401) ENCOR Official Cert Guide, Chapter 1 Packet Forwarding, Page 28
You issue the command "ip route 10.0.0.0 0.0.0.255 null0". What type of adjacency is created for the 10.0.0.0/24 network?
Drop
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/docs/ip/express-forwarding-cef/13706-20.html#express
A route with what interface destination would cause a drop CEF adjacency to be formed for the network?
Null0
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/docs/ip/express-forwarding-cef/13706-20.html#express

You run the command "access-list 1 permit 10.0.0.0 0.0.0.255 log" command. You then receive a packet from 10.0.0.5/24. The command "ip cef" is active on the device. What packet switching mechanism is used for this packet?
Process switching
https://tools.cisco.com/security/center/resources/access_control_list_logging
What ACL functionality would cause a packet to be processed switch on a switch with CEF enabled?
Logging
https://tools.cisco.com/security/center/resources/access_control_list_logging
What indicates a speed or duplex was auto-negotiated when doing a 'show int status'?
The 'a-' prefix before the speed/duplex.
OCG ENCOR Chapter 1 p17
What does the 'a-' prefix before the speed/duplex in a 'sh int status' indicate?
It was auto-negotiated
OCG ENCOR Chapter 1 p17
What are the possible results from a TCAM lookup?
True, False, Do not care
OCG ENCOR Chapter 1 p26
Where are the results 'True, False, Do not care' found?
In a TCAM lookup.
OCG ENCOR Chapter 1 p26
How are TCAM entries stored?
Value, Mask, and Result (VMR) format.
OCG ENCOR Chapter 1 p26
What uses Value, Mask, and Result (VMR) format?
TCAM entries
OCG ENCOR Chapter 1 p26
What are the two BPDU types?
Configuration / Topology Change
CCNP / CCIE Enterprise Core Official Cert Guide, Chapter 2, Page 38
Configuration and Topology Change Notification are two of which kind of STP frame?
BPDU
CCNP / CCIE Enterprise Core Official Cert Guide, Chapter 2, Page 38
